title: BBC.Glastonbury.2013.06.28.1080i.HDTV.h264-NX
description:
BBC.Glastonbury.2013.06.28.1080i.HDTV.h264-NX

Friday 28th June 2013

Part 1: 22:00-22:30 (30 minutes)
Returning after a year's hiatus and kicking off a weekend of extensive live coverage of Glastonbury Festival of Contemporary Performing Arts on BBC Two, join hosts Jo Whiley, Mark Radcliffe and Lauren Laverne as they whet your appetite for the weekend ahead. Presenting from a brand new home overlooking the vast Glastonbury site near the Park Stage, the team look at the best bits from the first day of the weekend.

Part 2: 23:00-02:00 (3 hours)
Live coverage from the Glastonbury Festival continues into the small hours with hosts Jo Whiley, Mark Radcliffe and Lauren Laverne, as returning heroes Arctic Monkeys take their place once again on the world famous Pyramid Stage to headline the first day. Following on from Arctic Monkeys, the team continue to present highlights from across the first day of the festival, with bespoke acoustic performances and unique insights into the late night world of Glastonbury.
